section.section:
The county shall exempt from any county tax personal property that is:
Used primarily in surface mining related activities, however operated, and whether or not in use; and
Surface mining related activities do not include the activities of any coal washing preparation coal plant.

text.section: Notwithstanding the exemption of any property from county taxation under this section, the property exempted in any county shall continue to be included in the assessable base of the county for the purposes of any other law, including State aid for education and State aid for police protection.
